attributes.action: Close pubs restaurants and other businesses to protect them
attributes.background: Boris Johnson has advised us not to go to any social places to avoid spreading the virus. However, this does not guarantee that the government will protect these businesses if they go under. We need the government to outright say that these places need to close on medical grounds.

rejection.details:
Since this petition was created, the Government has announced that pubs, clubs and restaurants are to close. It has also asked everyone to stay at home. You can find out more here:  https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can find out more about how to protect yourself and others from coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
